BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Resolution approving the appointment by the Council of Lauren Stossel as a member of the New York City Board of Corrections.
Items.MatterName: Lauren Stossel, New York City Board of Corrections

Items.Title: Resolution designating Patricia Marthone, a resident of Brooklyn, for appointment by the Mayor as a director of the New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation.
Items.MatterName: Patricia Marthone, New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation

Items.Title: Communication from the Public Advocate - Submitting the name of Leah S. Goodridge as a member of the New York City Planning Commission pursuant to §§ 31 and 192(a) of the New York City Charter.

Communication from the New York County Democratic Committee recommending the name of Marc Landis to the Council regarding his appointment to the office of Commissioner of Elections of the Board of Elections pursuant to § 3-204 of the New York State Election Law.
Items.MatterName: Marc Landis - Democratic Elections Commissioner for New York County.
